name: La Vision de l'âme de Guy de Thurno
description: La Vision de l'âme de Guy de Thurno; Simon Marmion (Flemish, active 1450 - 1489), and David Aubert (Flemish, active 1453 - 1479); Valenciennes, France; 1475; Tempera colors, gold, and ink on parchment bound by Trautz-Bauzonnet between pasteboard covered with modern brown morocco; Leaf: 36.4 × 25.7 cm (14 5/16 × 10 1/8 in.); Ms. 31; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: La Vision de l'âme de Guy de Thurno
medium: Tempera colors, gold, and ink on parchment bound by Trautz-Bauzonnet between pasteboard covered with modern brown morocco
